page.title: 11THE THAMES TIDAL DEFENCES
page.content: There are{4}gates held{horizontally } {9.5m}above water level. The larger of the gates each weigh{46.3}tonnes the smaller weigh{36.5}tonnes. The defence level is{6.05m.Cleveland}Bridge co. {manufactured}the gates. The four gates give a clear opening{36.5}metres wide. Each gate is lifted by{2}winches with a powerfull hydraulic motor of{200} horse power.The chains are{38mm}stud link and{28.5m}long. The gates are closed by gravity controlled by the winch motor. It takes{8\}minutes.The gates are held in position by latches which can be undone by hand. The gates can be lowered entirely by gravity in the event of failure, in either the main or{auxiliary}motor.
